{"id":1558792049,"question_id":15,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 week, 1 day","timestamp":1740806020,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"564 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1558792049/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20.6 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        result=[]\n\n        for i in range(len(nums)):\n            if i>0 and nums[i]==nums[i-1]:\n                continue\n            l=i+1\n            r=len(nums)-1\n\n            while l<r:\n                sum1=nums[r]+nums[i]+nums[l]\n\n                if sum1>0:\n                    r-=1\n                elif sum1<0:\n                    l+=1\n                else:\n                    result.append([nums[l],nums[r],nums[i]])\n                    l+=1\n                    r-=1\n                    while l<r and nums[l]==nums[l-1]:\n                        l+=1\n                        \n\n        return result\n                \n                ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
